content:
Hi,

The condition example f204-renal under the examples tab has the clinicalStatus as "active" but there is an abatement date present. According to the constraints for the resource, :if condition is abated, then clinical status must either be inactive, resolved or remission.

Is this an error or what would be the reasoning behind this?

Thanks,

Joel
When I look at http://build.fhir.org/condition-example-f204-renal.json.html, I see a clinicalStatus of inactive.

As an FYI, the STU3 invariant was faulty. Once the invariant was fixed (with GF#13201), we fixed the example at the same time. In sum, no changes are needed in build since we've already made the changes leading up to R4.

Thanks @Michelle (Moseman) Miller and @Lloyd McKenzie
